name: A.R.C.S
description:
Action Robot Combat Simulator Story

In a post apocalyptic world inhabited solely by robots, humans have abandoned the planet, leaving only the robots they created behind. They have reformed the Earth and it's core to suit their needs. However, their tampering has caused the Earth’s core to overheat, and will destroy the planet if something is not done. 

As an A.R.C.S. machine, you must travel to the center of the Earth and stop the core from exploding. Along the way, you will have to combat the evil robots that are trying to bring about the destruction of the planet. As you defeat these enemies and progress further, you will be able to upgrade yourself and unlock more powers. The fate of the new world is in your mechanical hands.

Features
  • 5 unique playable classes
  • Attribute customization
  • Custom audio and visuals
  • Melee and Ranged combat
  • Unique enemy behaviors
Future
  • New zones
  • Multiplayer mini games
  • Mobile Support
  • Save/Load
  • And more....
Note from Devs

We were tasked with creating an RPG for our University project, focused mainly on AI elements. Now that we completed the project, we figured we would share it with everyone and possibly expand on it in the future. Feel free to provide any and all critics/ideas/comments in order for us to make this game, and all future games better.
